level.text: In addition to any other penalty authorized by law, violations of this chapter shall, result in the termination of the water supply which shall not be restored until all arrears of water charges, together with penalties and the costs incurred in terminating and restoring the water supply, are paid. The same penalties shall apply when any Authority inspector is denied access to premises for the purpose of inspecting, reading, or installing water meters, setter, pits, vaults and other appurtenances and when any water meter or appurtenance is tampered with in any way.

level.heading: SOURCE
